column5: Been smoky for 3 days now.Today thick.Tonight wind change so will leave the area.Lots of fires

So yesterday I actually had a guide day.Had a absolute blast.Had a father and 2 young boys aged 4 and 8 from Winnipeg Mb.Well behaved kids and watching them all day was a pleasure.They both caught fish.Reeled up my fish and there dad's.Got minnows for us.Netted all the fish big and small.Real pleasure to fish with these youngsters.i took a bunch of pics but going to post only one.this one says it all for how the day went.
Another great day and I'm sure the kids had a blast,great job john

Was fun to have kids in the boat for sure.The 4 yr old hung in most of the day.Hot day at 30c he napped a couple of times but his brother fished 6 solid hrs.Bass were still shallow so about every cast one was caught on a popper or tiny torpedo.Walleyes were tougher with another mayflies hatch but we all managed to still get around 50 or so.While bass fishing we saw huge numbers of walleyes in 3-4 ft in the weed growth and those woukd not bite on anything even on an a hook on a slip bobber but the boys were fascinated being able to see them.
looks like a fun time John!
That looks like a very nice day.
Not so nice now.Smoke everywhere.Real low the in the trees.Tastes awfull.Tomorow wind change so will blow it out.
We was on Lake Of the Woods a couple of years ago and the smoke was so bad we had to go back to camp. It was clear at camp. Hate to hear that prov.
